There might be some extra costs, but it's there if you want it.Rest assured, this is not a scam or fake.No pressure, no hard sell. If you're curious or thinking about starting your online casino journey, I'm here to chat. Hit me up if you want the demo link and admin panel view.Thank You.

comments.author: gamblify
comments.body: I get it – when you're thinking about starting your online casino, having a design that resonates with leading casinos is crucial. The BC.Game clone script I've got might not match the design exactly, but think of it as a starting point, a canvas ready for your unique touch.Picture this: Maybe there's someone out there who loves the vibe of BC.Game and dreams of starting their own casino with that similar cool design. Well, guess what? That's exactly what I've got – a chance for someone with a vision.Now, here's the real talk – I'm not here to pressure anyone into buying. I just thought, "Hey, I've got this script, maybe someone out there is interested." If that's not you, no worries!Changing the design is a breeze. This script is all about laying the groundwork for your casino dream – consider it a jumpstart.If anyone is with a vision for a truly unique online casino design, guess what? I'm not just here to offer a script – I'm here to collaborate. If this clone script isn't quite hitting the mark for dream design, we've got your back.And let me be crystal clear – I'm not a scammer. I'm just a regular developer who stumbled upon this opportunity and wanted to share it. If you have questions, concerns, or just want to chat, I'm here. Your trust is vital, and I'm committed to being open and honest throughout.

comments.body: You are selling someone else script, not yours and then you expect a buyers trust. I don't know man, something is wrong in that picture. As for who's it is, BC.Game are a bunch of scammers anyway, so who cares? They have done so much wrong in this community and if someone wants to go ahead and build something better than them, I say, give it your best shot...Though starting a fair and funded casino is no easy feetMy tip to you OP, is to offer the ability to use an escrow throughout the setup and audit process. The buyer should put the 10k with a trusted escrow, then you should help them set it up, then a third party auditor should review the code and the server it has been setup on to ensure that it is secure.If you agree to those terms you will make the sale a lot smoother and may increase the likelihood of you getting a deal done.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: I would be cautious about purchasing this script, given the questionable reputation of BC.Game. There have been multiple accusations of scams and unanswered complaints against them. Starting a casino with a similar design as BC.Game could potentially damage your reputation and lead to user backlash.If you're still interested in starting an online casino, it would be better to develop a unique design and establish your own brand. This will help you avoid negative associations with BC.Game and build trust with your users.
